imdb.plot outline: Jefferey Winterbaum is unhappy, mean, pessimistic and sarcastic. He's also in debt up to his eyelids. What starts out as a normal, ordinary day ends up changing Jeff's life forever. Just like every other day, Jeff heads into his depressing, mundane job. Soon after getting into work, Mr. Richman, informs Jeff the company is going under. Out of a job and out of options, Jeff opts for the Community Prisoner Halfway House program. Jeff agrees to house a prisoner in his house for a year in exchange for $500,000. Jeff also makes this life changing decision without consulting his family. Jeff's life and the neighborhood will never be the same as crime relocates this spring.
imdb.title: Sentenced to Suburbia
plot: Jeffrey Winterbaum is a mean, pessimistic, and sarcastic family man who loses his job. His solution? Invite a convict into his home. _Sentenced to Suburbia_ (qv); the lengths one man will go to keep a life he hates.

Jefferey Winterbaum is unhappy, mean, pessimistic and sarcastic. He's also in debt up to his eyelids. What starts out as a normal, ordinary day ends up changing Jeff's life forever. Just like every other day, Jeff heads into his depressing, mundane job. Soon after getting into work, Mr. Richman, informs Jeff the company is going under. Out of a job and out of options, Jeff opts for the Community Prisoner Halfway House program. Jeff agrees to house a prisoner in his house for a year in exchange for $500,000. Jeff also makes this life changing decision without consulting his family. Jeff's life and the neighborhood will never be the same as crime relocates this spring.::Adam Staten
